docs.text:
Motivation


{contents}


Bootstrapping is a widely applicable technique for statistical estimation.






References


The 
bootstrapping wikipedia article
 is a comprehensive summary of the topic.  An extensive description of the bootstrap is the focus of the book 
Davison and Hinkley (1997): 
Bootstrap Methods and Their Application
.  Most of the methodology covered in the book is implemented in the 
boot
 package for the 
R programming language
.
docs.title: Introduction

docs.text: {contents}  Bootstrapping is a widely applicable technique for statistical estimation.

docs.text: The  bootstrapping wikipedia article  is a comprehensive summary of the topic.  An extensive description of the bootstrap is the focus of the book  Davison and Hinkley (1997):  Bootstrap Methods and Their Application .  Most of the methodology covered in the book is implemented in the  boot  package for the  R programming language .
